data.annotationProperty: Building blocks of your cognitive base that can be captured by MindRaider are your thoughts, analytical documents, images, friends, local files, tasks, web links, etc. that are represented as Concepts. Right sidebar allows you to annotate Concepts - simply write your label/annotation of the Concept (you may use HTML or *TWiki shorthand* syntax). Note that the Concept is saved whenever =Enter= key or =Ctrl-S= is pressed.
